protocol.name: P-G6906-1
protocol.text: About 100 seedlings were grown on a filter paper laid on 1xMSMO, 3% sucrose, 0.9% agar (Cat # A1296, Sigma) in 6 cm round Petri dishes.  Seeds were stratified for four days at 4 ˚C and then incubated for four days at 20˚C under short day (8 hours light: 16 hours dark) conditions.  The Petri dishes were tilted about 30˚ from vertical in a growth chamber equipped with red and blue LEDs (70.7 ¼E red light and 15.3 ¼E blue light).  Starting from subjective dawn at day five, cycles of 160 min light and 320 min dark were given for three days.  This sample was collected 280 minutes after subjective dawn on the fifth day; 120 minutes after lights-off.

protocol.name: P-G6906-2
protocol.text: From 5 ¼g of total RNA, cRNA was made and labeled with biotin (Affymetrix, CA) according to protocol described by Schmid, M. et al. Nat. Genet. 37, 501-506 (2005).

protocol.name: P-G6906-3
protocol.text: Samples were transferred to 1.5 ml tube and immediately frozen by liquid nitrogen and stored at â€"80˚C.  Samples were collected using infra-red (IR) goggles (Night Vision model NCB4, Night Owl Optics, NY) to avoid light exposure.  100 mg frozen tissue samples were ground by pestle and electric motor.  Total RNA was extracted using RNeasy Plant Mini kit (Qiagen, CA).
